Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>At my level, you can tell how strong a

days of looking at weapons!

Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you were me, what would you go for?<sp:5:0:0>
A Lynel, a Hinox,<sp:5:0:0> or a Talus?
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You've got to pretty fearless to take on
a Lynel.

One was spotted northwest of here <clr:0000>near
the entrance to Tempest Gulch<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though knowing you, I guess that one
might've been defeated already.

Lynels are swift, they're strong...<sp:5:0:0>and
they can fling fireballs from a distance.
Not easily beaten.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But if I could <clr:0000>get on its back <clr:ffff>and ride it

Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>To get the materials for a strong weapon,
I'll have to fight one of the biggies.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>But a Hinox... <sp:5:1:0>That one's really for the

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hinox though... <sp:5:1:0>They're huge and can

Strong attacks wouldn't be enough.
I'd have to fortify my defense as well.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Doable, I think... But I'll need to get some

Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>A Talus though... <sp:5:1:0>Fighting one of those

I did hear a rumor that there's one in

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But those things are solid as boulders...<sp:5:0:0>

Talk16:
